07D66B5F.Phase28Description: I need to bring Aldara's cursed amulet to Elder Lau so that it can be cleansed, removing its power over the sick villagers.

259D49BB.Phase15Description: Elder Lau wants me to search the funeral pyres for Brecht's body.

74FC533C.Phase25Description: I must go find Aldara and retrieve the cursed amulet that she carries in order to save the villagers that it has cursed.

92C33198.Phase12Description: I have questioned the other Elders in Wejinhani about this new sickness. I should tell Elder Lau what I have learned.
